snippet: Stocks climbed on speculation that Greece would be able to forge a deal with creditors. In China, shares enjoyed a second day of gains.
abstract: Stock market rises as Greece makes progress on receiving bailout package.
lead_paragraph: Stocks climbed on speculation that Greece would be able to forge a deal with creditors. In China, shares enjoyed a second day of gains.

headline.main: Buoyed by Hopeful News From Greece and China, U.S. Stocks Hit 2-Month High
headline.print_headline: Market Advances, Buoyed by Hopeful News From Greece and China
